index.description: A comma-separated list of index names to search; use `_all` or empty string to perform the operation on all indices

wait_for_completion_timeout.description: Specify the time that the request should block waiting for the final response

keep_on_completion.description: Control whether the response should be stored in the cluster if it completed within the provided [wait_for_completion] time (default: false)

keep_alive.description: Update the time interval in which the results (partial or final) for this search will be available

batched_reduce_size.description: The number of shard results that should be reduced at once on the coordinating node. This value should be used as the granularity at which progress results will be made available.

request_cache.description: Specify if request cache should be used for this request or not, defaults to true

analyzer.description: The analyzer to use for the query string

analyze_wildcard.description: Specify whether wildcard and prefix queries should be analyzed (default: false)

ccs_minimize_roundtrips.description: When doing a cross-cluster search, setting it to true may improve overall search latency, particularly when searching clusters with a large number of shards. However, when set to true, the progress of searches on the remote clusters will not be received until the search finishes on all clusters.

default_operator.description: The default operator for query string query (AND or OR)

df.description: The field to use as default where no field prefix is given in the query string

explain.description: Specify whether to return detailed information about score computation as part of a hit

stored_fields.description: A comma-separated list of stored fields to return as part of a hit

docvalue_fields.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return as the docvalue representation of a field for each hit

ignore_unavailable.description: Whether specified concrete indices should be ignored when unavailable (missing or closed)

ignore_throttled.description: Whether specified concrete, expanded or aliased indices should be ignored when throttled

allow_no_indices.description: Whether to ignore if a wildcard indices expression resolves into no concrete indices. (This includes `_all` string or when no indices have been specified)

expand_wildcards.description: Whether to expand wildcard expression to concrete indices that are open, closed or both.

lenient.description: Specify whether format-based query failures (such as providing text to a numeric field) should be ignored

preference.description: Specify the node or shard the operation should be performed on (default: random)

pre_filter_shard_size.description: Cannot be changed: this is to enforce the execution of a pre-filter roundtrip to retrieve statistics from each shard so that the ones that surely donâ€™t hold any document matching the query get skipped.

rest_total_hits_as_int.description: Indicates whether hits.total should be rendered as an integer or an object in the rest search response

q.description: Query in the Lucene query string syntax

routing.description: A comma-separated list of specific routing values

_source.description: True or false to return the _source field or not, or a list of fields to return

_source_excludes.description: A list of fields to exclude from the returned _source field

_source_includes.description: A list of fields to extract and return from the _source field

terminate_after.description: The maximum number of documents to collect for each shard, upon reaching which the query execution will terminate early.

stats.description: Specific 'tag' of the request for logging and statistical purposes

suggest_field.description: Specify which field to use for suggestions

suggest_size.description: How many suggestions to return in response

suggest_text.description: The source text for which the suggestions should be returned

track_scores.description: Whether to calculate and return scores even if they are not used for sorting

track_total_hits.description: Indicate if the number of documents that match the query should be tracked. A number can also be specified, to accurately track the total hit count up to the number.

allow_partial_search_results.description: Indicate if an error should be returned if there is a partial search failure or timeout

typed_keys.description: Specify whether aggregation and suggester names should be prefixed by their respective types in the response

version.description: Specify whether to return document version as part of a hit

seq_no_primary_term.description: Specify whether to return sequence number and primary term of the last modification of each hit

max_concurrent_shard_requests.description: The number of concurrent shard requests per node this search executes concurrently. This value should be used to limit the impact of the search on the cluster in order to limit the number of concurrent shard requests

body.description: The search definition using the Query DSL
